- **Enhanced Pack Option**: New variant that includes pre-installed resource packs and shader packs

### Features
- **Automatic Installation**: Enhanced packs include visual improvements without manual setup
- **1.20.1 Compatibility**: All resource packs and shaders verified for Minecraft 1.20.1
- **Choose Your Experience**: 
  - Regular pack: Standard gameplay experience
  - Enhanced pack: Beautiful visuals included out-of-the-box

### Technical
- **Smart Version Management**: Automatically fetches latest compatible versions from Modrinth
- **Optimized Distribution**: Efficient mrpack format with proper overrides structure
- **Server Integration**: Pre-configured with minecraft.mage.net server connection

### Pack Details
- Version: 1.0.9
- Minecraft: 1.20.1
